I have the following class that filters request to run only those 
methods =
in Trial.class with a "SRG" prefix.

@RunWith(Suite.class)
@...=
ses({
   Trial.class
})
public class SRGSuite {
    public static void main=
(String argv[]) {
     JUnitCore jCore =3D new JUnitCore();
     Request re=
q =3D Request.classes("SESSuite",SRGSuite.class);
     jCore.run(req.filter=
With(new TestFilter("SRG")));
    }
}

This works fine if I run the class d=
irectly. However, when I run it 
from ANT1.7, it runs all the methods in Tr=
ial class and not just the 
prefixed ones. 

I understand that ANT isn't ca=
lling my main method, but then how do
